info.name: IGN Boards - Remove ad bar and bottom spacing
info.description:
Bottom spacing:
Removes the box at the bottom of the boards that link to Gamespy, Comrade, etc. Credit goes to gamerx1011 and his Arrondi stylesheet.

Ad bar:
Removes the bar at the top of the IGN boards that links to AskMen, Rotten Tomatoes, etc.
